name: Elleboxco Incorporated
description: Provider of a female hygiene subscription box service intended to deliver safe and sustainable period products. The company offers a customized selection of pads and tampons, acne-fighting products, hygiene, and self-care items, enabling young females to get personal care products easily at their doorstep without needing to run to the drug store.
one_liner: Provider of a female hygiene subscription box service intended to deliver safe and sustainable period products. The company offers a customized selection of pads and tampons, acne-fighting products, hygiene, and self-care items, enabling young females to get personal care products easily at their doorstep without needing to run to the drug store.
